isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - RADIATOR, REMOVE AND REPLACE - RADIATOR and Component INSTALLation - FRONT CROSS-MEMBER

svcproc.title: FRONT CROSS-MEMBER
svcproc.para: Locate the front cross-member assembly, bumper mounting assembly, and tow hooks for installation prior to re-installing the front hood and grille assembly.

step1.para: Place the front cross-member assembly between the frame rail at the front of the chassis.
Align the front bumper mounting bracket with the frame rail holes and front cross-member mounting holes. Install the top two bolts and hand tighten.
Align the tow hook assembly holes with the bumper mounting bracket, frame and cross-member assembly holes.
Install the tow hook bolts and tighten.
Tighten the bumper mounting bracket bolts.
Locate and install the lower radiator screen protector on the lower cross-member frame assembly.
Insert the mounting bolts and tighten.
Refer to S09003 - Hood, Fender and Grille Service manual for installation of the hood, fender and grille assemblies.
